cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
import xgboost as xgb
import lightgbm as lgb
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.impute import SimpleImputer
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Feature engineering: create family size and is_alone
train_df['FamilySize'] = train_df['SibSp'] + train_df['Parch'] + 1
test_df['FamilySize'] = test_df['SibSp'] + test_df['Parch'] + 1

train_df['IsAlone'] = (train_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)
test_df['IsAlone'] = (test_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# Extract title from Name (e.g., Mr., Mrs., Miss)
def extract_title(name):
    if pd.isna(name):
        return 'Unknown'
    title = name.split(',')[1].split('.')[0].strip()
    title_mapping = {
        'Mr': 'Mr',
        'Mrs': 'Mrs',
        'Miss': 'Miss',
        'Master': 'Master',
        'Dr': 'Dr',
        'Rev': 'Rev',
        'Col': 'Col',
        'Major': 'Major',
        'Mlle': 'Miss',
        'Countess': 'Countess',
        'Don': 'Sir',
        'Sir': 'Sir',
        'Lady': 'Lady',
        'Jonkheer': 'Sir',
        'Capt': 'Capt'
    }
    return title_mapping.get(title, 'Unknown')

train_df['Title'] = train_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)
test_df['Title'] = test_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)

# Map titles to categories
title_mapping = {
    'Mr': 0, 'Mrs': 1, 'Miss': 2, 'Master': 3, 'Dr': 4, 'Rev': 5,
    'Col': 6, 'Major': 7, 'Mlle': 2, 'Countess': 8, 'Don': 9, 'Sir': 10,
    'Lady': 11, 'Jonkheer': 10, 'Capt': 12
}
train_df['Title'] = train_df['Title'].map(title_mapping).fillna(0)
test_df['Title'] = test_df['Title'].map(title_mapping).fillna(0)

# Encode E

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder, OneHotEncoder
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
import xgboost as xgb
import lightgbm as lgb
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.impute import SimpleImputer
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Feature engineering: create family size and is_alone
train_df['FamilySize'] = train_df['SibSp'] + train_df['Parch'] + 1
test_df['FamilySize'] = test_df['SibSp'] + test_df['Parch'] + 1

train_df['IsAlone'] = (train_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)
test_df['IsAlone'] = (test_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# Extract title from Name
def extract_title(name):
    if pd.isna(name):
        return 'Unknown'
    title = name.split(',')[1].split('.')[0].strip()
    title_mapping = {
        'Mr': 'Mr',
        'Mrs': 'Mrs',
        'Miss': 'Miss',
        'Master': 'Master',
        'Dr': 'Dr',
        'Rev': 'Rev',
        'Col': 'Col',
        'Major': 'Major',
        'Mlle': 'Miss',
        'Countess': 'Countess',
        'Don': 'Sir',
        'Sir': 'Sir',
        'Lady': 'Lady',
        'Jonkheer': 'Sir',
        'Capt': 'Capt'
    }
    return title_mapping.get(title, 'Unknown')

train_df['Title'] = train_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)
test_df['Title'] = test_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)

# Map titles to numeric
title_mapping = {
    'Mr': 0, 'Mrs': 1, 'Miss': 2, 'Master': 3, 'Dr': 4, 'Rev': 5,
    'Col': 6, 'Major': 7, 'Mlle': 2, 'Countess': 8, 'Don': 9, 'Sir': 10,
    'Lady': 11, 'Jonkheer': 10, 'Capt': 12
}
train_df['Title'] = train_df['Title'].map(title_mapping).fillna(0)
test_df['Title'] = test_df['Title'].map(title_mapping).fillna(0)

# Encode Embarked

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder, OneHotEncoder
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
import xgboost as xgb
import lightgbm as lgb
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.impute import SimpleImputer
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Feature engineering: create family size and is_alone
train_df['FamilySize'] = train_df['SibSp'] + train_df['Parch'] + 1
test_df['FamilySize'] = test_df['SibSp'] + test_df['Parch'] + 1

train_df['IsAlone'] = (train_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)
test_df['IsAlone'] = (test_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# Extract title from Name
def extract_title(name):
    if pd.isna(name):
        return 'Unknown'
    title = name.split(',')[1].split('.')[0].strip()
    title_mapping = {
        'Mr': 'Mr',
        'Mrs': 'Mrs',
        'Miss': 'Miss',
        'Master': 'Master',
        'Dr': 'Dr',

        'Sir': 'Sir',
        'Lady': 'Lady',
        'Jonkheer': 'Sir',
        'Capt': 'Capt'
    }
    return title_mapping.get(title, 'Unknown')

train_df['Title'] = train_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)
test_df['Title'] = test_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)

title_mapping = {
    'Mr': 0, 'Mrs': 1, 'Miss': 2, 'Master': 3, 'Dr': 4, 'Rev': 5,
    'Col': 6, 'Major': 7, 'Mlle': 2, 'Countess': 8, 'Don': 9, 'Sir': 10,
    'Lady': 11, 'Jonkheer': 10, 'Capt': 12
}
train_df['Title'] = train_df['Title'].map(title_mapping).fillna(0)
test_df['Title'] = test_df['Title'].map(title_mapping).fillna(0)

cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
import xgboost as xgb
import lightgbm as lgb
from sklearn.impute import SimpleImputer
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Feature engineering: create family size and is_alone
train_df['FamilySize'] = train_df['SibSp'] + train_df['Parch'] + 1
test_df['FamilySize'] = test_df['SibSp'] + test_df['Parch'] + 1

train_df['IsAlone'] = (train_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)
test_df['IsAlone'] = (test_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# Extract title from Name
def extract_title(name):
    if pd.isna(name):
        return 'Unknown'
    title = name.split(',')[1].split('.')[0].strip()
    title_mapping = {
        'Mr': 'Mr',
        'Mrs': 'Mrs',
        'Miss': 'Miss',
        'Master': 'Master',
        'Dr': 'Dr',
        'Rev': 'Rev',
        'Col': 'Col',
        'Major': 'Major',
        'Mlle': 'Miss',
        'Countess': 'Countess',
        'Don': 'Sir',
        'Sir': 'Sir',
        'Lady': 'Lady',
        'Jonkheer': 'Sir',
        'Capt': 'Capt'
    }
    return title_mapping.get(title, 'Unknown')

train_df['Title'] = train_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)
test_df['Title'] = test_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)

# Map titles to numeric
title_mapping = {
    'Mr': 0, 'Mrs': 1, 'Miss': 2, 'Master': 3, 'Dr': 4, 'Rev': 5,
    'Col': 6, 'Major': 7, 'Mlle': 2, 'Countess': 8, 'Don': 9, 'Sir': 10,
    'Lady': 11, 'Jonkheer': 10, 'Capt': 12
}
train_df['Title'] = train_df['Title'].map(title_mapping).fillna(0)
test_df['Title'] = test_df['Title'].map(title_mapping).fillna(0)

# Encode Embarked
embarked_mapping = {'S': 0, 'C': 1, 'Q': 2}
train_df['Embarked'] = train_df['Embarked'].map(embarked_mapping).
